body:
## #hackpompey

social hack event for everyone based in portsmouth

## Social stuff

It's hackpompey everywhere really, use #hackpompey as the hashtag yeeee

* Twitter: [@hackpompey](http://www.twitter.com/hackpompey)
* Facebook: [/hackpompey](http://www.facebook.com/hackpompey)
* Instagram [@hackpompey](http://www.instagram.com/hackpompey)
* Snapchat: hackpompey
